ingredients: 1 (9 inch) unbaked pie crust, 3 cups sliced Bartlett pears, 1 cup sour cream,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1  egg,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt
nutrition: Total Fat 26g 33%, Saturated Fat 13g 66%, Cholesterol 66mg 22%, Sodium 369mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 48g 17%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 25g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 3mg 15%, Calcium 53mg 4%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 154mg 3%
